title: 100Copies reflects light & dark in geometric Shine On cycling artwork
content:
100Copies goes metallic in gold & silver with Thomas Yangâ€™s latest geometric cycling art print. Taking inspiration from the contrast between riding through the day and the night, Shine On reflects its stylistic cyclist over contrasting white & black background. Pick how you want to hang this piece, whether riding through the light or dark
